org.apache.ugli
Interface LoggerFactoryAdapter

All Known Implementing Classes:
JDK14LoggerFA, Log4jLoggerFA, NOPLoggerFA, SimpleLoggerFA
public interface LoggerFactoryAdapter

LoggerFactoryAdapter interface is used internally by LoggerFactory.

Only developers wishing to write new UGLI adapters need to worry about this interface.

Author:
Ceki Gülcü
